title: CanChangeState​
content: </> Transition:CanChangeState(data: {[string]: any}) → boolean [Virtual Method] Whether it can change to this state or not True -- Can change False -- Cannot

title: OnDataChanged​
content: </> Transition:OnDataChanged(data: {[string]: any}) → boolean [Virtual method] Should return true if it should change to this state and false if it shouldn't

title: OnInit​
content: </> State:OnInit(data: {[string]: any}) → () [Virtual method] Called whenever a state machine is created with this state

title: OnEnter​
content: </> State:OnEnter(data: {[string]: any}) → () [Virtual method] Called whenever you enter this state

title: OnHearBeat​
content: </> State:OnHearBeat( data: {[string]: any}, deltaTime: number ) → () [Virtual method] Called every frame after the physics simulation while in this state

title: OnLeave​
content: </> State:OnLeave(data: {[string]: any}) → () [Virtual method] Called whenever you leave this state

title: GetCurrentState​
content: </> StateMachine:GetCurrentState() → string Returns the current state of the State Machine

title: ChangeData​
content: </> StateMachine:ChangeData( index: string, newValue: any ) → () Changing data request

title: GetData​
content: </> StateMachine:GetData() → {[string]: any} Gets the custom data

title: LoadDirectory​
content: </> StateMachine:LoadDirectory(directory: Instance ) → {any} Used to load thru a directory

title: _CheckTransitions​
content: </> StateMachine:_CheckTransitions(fromHeartbeat: boolean) → () Checks if we meet any condition to change the current state
